name: Bokos Garden
description:
Bokos garden is a small platformer submitted to the Spring into Summer Sokjam! In this game, you will have to find watering cans to turn plants into trees. You will navigate levels using the warp mechanic. For example, if you go left you will end up at the right of the level, but if you go down you will end up at the top of the level!

P.S. you are able to reset levels because with this mechanic, you may encounter soft locks.

Features:

- 🏡12 levels that I think are easy but you may find hard.

- ⚔️ Dodge obstacles

- 🌽 Make your way through mazes

- 🎨 Programming and art by Kris O

- 🎵 Catchy music and SFX by BBTombo Music | bb tombo (bandcamp.com)

🎮 CONTROLS:

- Move: Left/Right Arrows

- Jump: Up Arrow

- Pause: ESC

- Click Button: Mouse
